result.execSummary:
The defendant Krista A Kucharski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight Time. Sentence credit of 30 days were granted if imposed.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

Submit to an AODA assessment, follow through with any treatment, counseling.  No use or possession of alcohol or illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety. No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.  Follow all orders of Courts with competent jurisdiction. 
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

Jail Inmate Communication Form filed by defendant requesting time served jail credit.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Krista A Kucharski in court, in custody, with attorney Kelsey Morin.   Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.

Court orders the following: 
Ct. 1:
- 90 days jail straight time STAYED for 1 year Probation - credit for 30 days if revoked. 
- Court Costs of $243.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation 
- DNA Surcharge of  $200.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation
- Conditions of  Probation: AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment/counseling. Maintain absolute sobriety.   Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent. No use or possession of alcohol or controlled substances without a valid prescription. Follow all orders of Courts with competent jurisdiction.  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Defendant Krista A Kucharski in court, in custody, with attorney Kelsey Morin.   Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court calls the matter to address the bail motion filed by Attorney Morin.  Attorney Morin requests that the court amend the bond to a signature bond.  The State objects to any bail modification.  The Court denies the motion for bail modification and bail remains as set.  The State is to provide discovery and pretrial offer to Attorney Morin prior to the next hearing.
Motion for bail reduction or modification
Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances or any inhalents without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.

Defendant Krista A Kucharski in court, in custody, with attorney Adam J. Schleis.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears as friend of the court.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
